armored pants.description: They're not easy to gett off. Others have grown used to the pee smell that follows you

armored vest.description: Basically a large piece of metel welded around your body. Not very comfortable to sleep in.

baseball bat.description: classic home evasion deterrent, you've given this thing about 87 nicknames by now

baton.description: this might have been the same one you got beat with during your college protestor phase

bo staff.description: Memories of your old karate teacher flood your mind as you hold it. Memories your've tried to supress for years...

broadsword.description: This thing has a big ol' blade. Looks friggin' boss.

cardboard box shoes.description: You accidently stumbled into them and haven't yet bothered to take them off.

katana.description: bought from an ocean side novelty shop. You thought it looked cool, so the purchase was justified

pigskin.description: From the depths of someone's garage. You've never used it and you hope you never have to...

smelly.name: smelly
smelly.desc: The item smells like.... mold? eggs? sulphur? You can't quite place it, as it burns your nose too much to try

broken.name: broken
broken.desc: It's in terrible shape, it hardly even works anymore, but so much blood and sweat has been stained into it that you need to see how far it can actually go.

hot.name: hot
hot.desc: hard to handle because it always feels like it came out of liquid hot magma. After a while you get used to holding it, as the last few receptors in your hand explode
